alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:33AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Madison and northeastern Washington Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 433 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Greenland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Wesley... Japton... Drake Field Airport... Johnson... Goshen... Georgetown... Prairie Grove Battlefield State... Walnut Grove... Tuttle... Sulphur City... Delaney... Arnett... Hicks... Crosses... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 53 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
